history.proof: intros E. induction E using Ens'_rect. simpl. shelve.

exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type e : A -> Ens' H : forall a : A, IN (inj (e a)) Big Unable to unify "match Sing ?M1414 with | sup A f => EXType A (fun y : A => EQ ?M1414 (f y)) end" with "EXType Ens' (fun y : Ens' => Ens_rect (fun _ : Ens => Prop) (fun (B : Type) (g : B -> Ens) (_ : B -> Prop) => (forall x : A, EXType B (fun y0 : B => EQ (inj (e x)) (g y0))) /\\ (forall y0 : B, EXType A (fun x : A => EQ (inj (e x)) (g y0)))) (inj y))".

In environment A : Type e : A -> Ens' H : forall a : A, IN (inj (e a)) Big Unable to unify "match Union ?M1414 with | sup A f => EXType A (fun y : A => EQ ?M1416 (f y)) end" with "EXType Ens' (fun y : Ens' => Ens_rect (fun _ : Ens => Prop) (fun (B : Type) (g : B -> Ens) (_ : B -> Prop) => (forall x : A, EXType B (fun y0 : B => EQ (inj (e x)) (g y0))) /\\ (forall y0 : B, EXType A (fun x : A => EQ (inj (e x)) (g y0)))) (inj y))".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall E : Ens', IN (inj E) Big

Premises:
inj = fun X : Ens' => Ens'_rect (fun _ : Ens' => Ens) (fun (A : Type) (_ : A -> Ens') (fr : A -> Ens) => sup A fr) X : Ens' -> Ens
Big = sup Ens' inj : Ens
IN = fun E1 E2 : Ens => match E2 with | sup A f => EXType A (fun y : A => EQ E1 (f y)) end : Ens -> Ens -> Prop
Inductive Ens : Type := sup : forall A : Type, (A -> Ens) -> Ens Arguments sup _%type_scope _%function_scope
Power_sound_inj : forall E : Ens', EQ (inj (Power' E)) (Power (inj E))
inj_sound : forall E1 E2 : Ens', EQ' E1 E2 -> EQ (inj E1) (inj E2)
IN_Sing : forall E : Ens, IN E (Sing E)
IN_Inter_all : forall E E' : Ens, IN E' (Inter E) -> forall E'' : Ens, IN E'' E -> IN E' E''
IN_Inter'_all : forall E E' : Ens, IN E' (Inter' E) -> forall E'' : Ens, IN E'' E -> IN E' E''
IN_Union : forall E E' E'' : Ens, IN E' E -> IN E'' E' -> IN E'' (Union E)
all_IN_Inter' : forall E E' E'' : Ens, IN E'' E -> (forall E''0 : Ens, IN E''0 E -> IN E' E''0) -> IN E' (Inter' E)
all_IN_Inter : forall E E' E'' : Ens, IN E'' E -> (forall E''0 : Ens, IN E''0 E -> IN E' E''0) -> IN E' (Inter E)
INC_IN_Power : forall E E' : Ens, INC E' E -> IN E' (Power E)
IN_Power_INC : forall E E' : Ens, IN E' (Power E) -> INC E' E
IN_INC_Union : forall E E' : Ens, IN E' E -> INC E' (Union E)
Union_IN : forall E E' : Ens, IN E' (Union E) -> EXType Ens (fun E1 : Ens => IN E1 E /\ IN E' E1)
IN_EXType : forall E E' : Ens, IN E' E -> EXType (pi1 E) (fun a : pi1 E => EQ E' (pi2 E a))
Inter' = fun E : Ens => Comp (Union E) (fun e : Ens => forall a : Ens, IN a E -> IN e a) : Ens -> Ens
IN_sound_right : forall E E' E'' : Ens, EQ E' E'' -> IN E E' -> IN E E''
IN_sound_left : forall E E' E'' : Ens, EQ E E' -> IN E E'' -> IN E' E''
IN_Paire_left : forall E E' : Ens, IN E (Paire E E')
Vide_est_vide : forall E : Ens, IN E Vide -> F
INC = fun E1 E2 : Ens => forall E : Ens, IN E E1 -> IN E E2 : Ens -> Ens -> Prop
IN_Paire_right : forall E E' : Ens, IN E' (Paire E E')
IN_Sing_EQ : forall E E' : Ens, IN E (Sing E') -> EQ E E'
tout_vide_est_Vide : forall E : Ens, (forall E' : Ens, IN E' E -> F) -> EQ E Vide
Paire_IN : forall E E' A : Ens, IN A (Paire E E') -> EQ A E \/ EQ A E'
IN_P_Comp : forall (E A : Ens) (P : Ens -> Prop), (forall w1 w2 : Ens, P w1 -> EQ w1 w2 -> P w2) -> IN A E -> P A -> IN A (Comp E P)
Ens'_sind : forall P : Ens' -> SProp, (forall (A : Type) (e : A -> Ens'), (forall a : A, P (e a)) -> P (sup' A e)) -> forall e : Ens', P e
Ens'_rect : forall P : Ens' -> Type, (forall (A : Type) (e : A -> Ens'), (forall a : A, P (e a)) -> P (sup' A e)) -> forall e : Ens', P e
Ens'_ind : forall P : Ens' -> Prop, (forall (A : Type) (e : A -> Ens'), (forall a : A, P (e a)) -> P (sup' A e)) -> forall e : Ens', P e
Ens'_rec : forall P : Ens' -> Set, (forall (A : Type) (e : A -> Ens'), (forall a : A, P (e a)) -> P (sup' A e)) -> forall e : Ens', P e
IN_Comp_P : forall (E A : Ens) (P : Ens -> Prop), (forall w1 w2 : Ens, P w1 -> EQ w1 w2 -> P w2) -> IN A (Comp E P) -> P A
EQ_refl : forall E : Ens, EQ E E
pi2 : forall E : Ens, pi1 E -> Ens
Inter = fun E : Ens => match E with | sup A f => sup (depprod A (fun a : A => depprod (pi1 (f a)) (fun b : pi1 (f a) => forall x : A, IN (pi2 (f a) b) (f x)))) (fun c : depprod A (fun a : A => depprod (pi1 (f a)) (fun b : pi1 (f a) => forall x : A, IN (pi2 (f a) b) (f x))) => match c with | @dep_i _ _ a (@dep_i _ _ b _) => pi2 (f a) b end) end : Ens -> Ens
Sing = fun E : Ens => Paire E E : Ens -> Ens
Paire = fun E E' : Ens => sup bool (fun H : bool => bool_rect (fun _ : bool => Ens) E E' H) : Ens -> Ens -> Ens
Power = fun E : Ens => match E with | sup A f => sup (A -> Prop) (fun P : A -> Prop => sup (depprod A (fun a : A => P a)) (fun c : depprod A (fun a : A => P a) => match c with | @dep_i _ _ a _ => f a end)) end : Ens -> Ens
Power' = fun E : Ens' => match E with | sup' A f => sup' (A -> Prop) (fun P : A -> Prop => sup' (depprod'' A (fun a : A => P a)) (fun c : depprod'' A (fun a : A => P a) => match c with | @dep_i'' _ _ a _ => f a end)) end : Ens' -> Ens'
Record almost_ring_theory (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop) : Prop := mk_art { ARadd_0_l : forall x : R, req (radd rO x) x; ARadd_comm : forall x y : R, req (radd x y) (radd y x); ARadd_assoc : forall x y z : R, req (radd x (radd y z)) (radd (radd x y) z); ARmul_1_l : forall x : R, req (rmul rI x) x; ARmul_0_l : forall x : R, req (rmul rO x) rO; ARmul_comm : forall x y : R, req (rmul x y) (rmul y x); ARmul_assoc : forall x y z : R, req (rmul x (rmul y z)) (rmul (rmul x y) z); ARdistr_l : forall x y z : R, req (...
BinNat.N.peano_rec_base : forall (P : BinNums.N -> Set) (a : P BinNums.N0) (f : forall n : BinNums.N, P n -> P (BinNat.N.succ n)), BinNat.N.peano_rec P a f BinNums.N0 = a
BinNat.N.peano_rect_base : forall (P : BinNums.N -> Type) (a : P BinNums.N0) (f : forall n : BinNums.N, P n -> P (BinNat.N.succ n)), BinNat.N.peano_rect P a f BinNums.N0 = a
BinNat.N.peano_rec : forall P : BinNums.N -> Set, P BinNums.N0 -> (forall n : BinNums.N, P n -> P (BinNat.N.succ n)) -> forall n : BinNums.N, P n

```  
intros E. induction E using Ens'_rect.
- simpl. apply IN_Sing.
- simpl. apply IN_Union.
  + apply IHens'1.
  + apply IHens'2.
```

original: intros E. induction E using Ens'_rect. - simpl. apply IN_Sing. - simpl. apply IN_Union. + apply IHens'1. + apply IHens'2.
